StringTable.Label: AngelsTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tech tree focused on Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: Tech tree focused on Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We cannot remain on Aphrodite indefinitely if we hope to consume all the potential energy in the galaxy. We must expand.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoIndustrializationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting even our most basic technology to work on alien worlds is a serious challenge. But no challenge is too great for a people infused with our inner strength.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing capacity will prove critical to enriching ourselves as we expand throughout space. And it will of course be useful when and if we need to expand our reach by forceful means.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: New technology always offers the opportunity for profit, whether via artificial scarcity, or even simple counterfeiting. In the long term, our mastery of the physical world will help us spread our reach further and faster.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The more in our treasury, the greater the chance travels will come seeking wealth and leave faring us further across time and space.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Advanced factories will help increase our manufacturing capacity, ensuring our people have the tools they need to continue their journey.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right motivation techniques we can ensure our workers are as committed to our worship as possible, and understand the importance of production in spreading it. This should boost production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Using our pray within the Secret Order to identify and purge the blasphemers, we can ensure managers within our manufacturing sector are loyally committed to worshipping the false idols, and willing to make all necessary sacrifices to reduce our manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Mandorory worker donation are made in our worship. All manufacturing maintenance costs should now be reduced.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoManufacturingMethods_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the enlightened work of our researchers, we're now able to build a new generation of exotic manufacturing centers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who believe in the Weeping Angels as omnipotent beings, work harder.

StringTable.Label: AngelsManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A small decrease in civilians used for "potential energy" will increase manufacturing to allows us to build the cultural structures and facilities we need to introduce the people to their new way of life.

StringTable.Label: AngelsManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduce our manufacturing costs a bit more.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have found a way to manipulate matter on the level of individual atoms. Crude to someone who understands the majesty of "potential energy", but this mastery of physical matter will allow us to increase our manufacturing capacity even more.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military manufacturing is now as efficient as it can be. We shall soon force worship into the minds of all who have resisted its brilliance.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The structures which assure our people's quality of life and assist with the spread of the faith can now be made for far fewer resources.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPracticalFusion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved power plants.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPracticalFusion_Dec
StringTable.String: Cascading fusion reactors will allow our manufacturing plants to be more effective. Although these represent an enormous security risk, even those lacking modest intelligence wouldn't be foolish enough to tamper with them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumPower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic power plants.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumPower_Dec
StringTable.String: The energy stored in the quantum zero point state will grant our manufacturing plants an almost limitless source of power. This is a gift from the progenitor, and we must use it wisely.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInstitutionalResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Researching the physical world is important to our potential energy sources, so we'd better get good at it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right adjustments, we can grant our faithful researchers the time they need to conduct research, while still tapping into sufficient potential energy stores.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are blinded by both their work and their commitment to the faith. Certainly too blind to pay attention to trivial secular things like money. With the right managers, we should be able to cut down on our research costs quite a bit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We should ensure our research facilities consume as few of our resources as possible by consuming the potential energy of those who have already served their purpose.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchCenters_Dec
StringTable.String: Advanced research facilities will give our researchers the tools they need to push back the veil of darkness of the physical world.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and tapping some of the more wasteful scientists, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntegratedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Advanced academies can accommodate teams of researchers working on larger, more complicated projects, and provide the spiritual support those researchers need to maintain their faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A massive city-sized research facility will allow our researchers the time they need to make the biggest breakthroughs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: Research teams dedicated to studying these congruencies may be able to make incredible breakthroughs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: It should come as no surprise, but our grasp of time and space has led us to startling truths about the quantum world. Both this plane and the next are falling open before us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: Ascension will make us immortal, allowing us to tap the entire universes potential energy as we desire it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchCoordination_Dec
StringTable.String: As devout as they are, our researchers are by their nature, a bit absent minded. We'll be able to get the most out of them by constructing coordination centers to organize their work and keep them focused on the task at hand.

StringTable.Label: AngelsNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsNeroLinking_Dec
StringTable.String: Direct brain-to-brain communication will greatly increase the effectiveness of our researchers, and make it far easier for us to monitor their thoughts for weakness and doubt.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCoordinationTempleTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Coordination Temple.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCoordinationTempleTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The coordination of labor and spiritual health of our devoted workers can be tended to by specially trained curates who already have mastered critical aspects of the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLaborMissionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Labor Mission.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLaborMissionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The purpose of the faith is to spead the worship of the Weeping Angels. Facilities to assist workers with a spiritual journey that will help them contribute better to our civilization.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLaborOracleTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Labor Oracle.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLaborOracleTech_Dec
StringTable.String: On rare nights, Angels are born that possess the ability to see into another's eyes and take the true measure of their potential. By placing these gifted individuals in the right places, we can ensure all our workers are devout believers in the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: The planets we settle on will require a variety of structures, for food production, places of worship, and internal monitoring.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have found a forgotten species of crop from our own world which adapts well to alien environments. Food production should go up as a result further expanding our ability to tap into more citizens potential energy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: With a few simple changes to the appropriate elements of the faith, we can tie some of our rituals surrounding food to the importance of fertility. With the right touch, and some gentle winking, our population growth rates should increase as a result.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting some of our crops to include mild stimulants will ensure our workers can work longer and harder, improving the production capacity without impacting the time they need to worship the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farms. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: If we increase our farming potential to expand our colonies faster, we can ensure more Angels can be feed by our prey.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Placing a loyal curate in charge of each farm, to "bless" the food as it is produced will ensure that less of it goes "missing" in production, indirectly boosting our farm production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we directly procure start up equipment for our farmers, instead of forcing them to take the unfairly inflated prices our black market offers, we can reduce the start up costs of our farms somewhat.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels standing watch over the farms cuts down on the vandalism and theft, it should be cheaper to run our farms.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Our followers multi-racial nature means that we're already used to growing wide varieties of crops to suit various diets. The variety of crops needed, and the space that requires has made our farmers experts at growing in even the most marginal conditions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have discovered that if we force our farmers to implement a different code of fertilization techniques, we should see greater food production. A change to the Farmers faith is in order.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angelic Order has quietly suggested we reduce the costs of starting a farm by simply giving our farmers less money. The farmers don't seem happy about it, but they do the work anyways, because they have to. The Angelic Order is wise.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The progenitor saw fit to bless worlds across the galaxy with plants edible by our followers, and by taking the strains and species which adapt to the widest range of environments, we can ensure our farms operate much more cost-efficiently.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have developed a way to insert inventory tracking devices into food as soon as it's produced, which should dramatically cut down on the mysterious losses we attribute to theft.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: By replacing our monitoring curates with automated food blessing systems, we can remove a bottleneck that had been holding back our food production capacity.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The example set by our farmers now serves as a symbol of angelic fertility, and with the right change to the faith, we can make that symbol a legally meaningful one. Mere proximity to farms will now require our people to reproduce more.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFoodDistributionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFoodDistributionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Distributing different types of food to the many races of the Angelic Order is something we mastered millennia ago. Adapting these tools and techniques to new worlds will be a small challenge for a people so enlightened.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoIrrigation_Dec
StringTable.String: A member of the Angelic Order has approached us with a request to permit his organization to begin constructing large scale irrigation systems for our colonies. A large contract to just give away, but the benefit to our food production is undeniable.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiomassResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiomassResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Biomass resequencers will allow us to turn compost into food. This will boost the production of neighbouring farms, but also create a black market for compost. Let's make sure the Angelic Order get their foot into that business before we begin.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Due to our unique heritage, the Weeping Angels are already familiar with multi-species medical issues. Adapting this philosophy to the challenges posed by alien biospheres is a small step, but one that must still be taken. Our people deserve proper medical care.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPopulationEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angelic Order governs the way our people must live their lives as they slowly come closer to the faith. It is not a static thing, and by adjusting it wisely, we can require our people to attend the fertility clinics necessary for building a strong population.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBioReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: Bio-replication has profound ethical considerations, but only for our followers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows soil enhancement and improves adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our researchers' efforts, we can now manipulate the terrain of a planet with the same ease with which we shape the hearts and minds of our followers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing sector requires reliable sources of energy and resources. If it's in the interest of the Angelic Order, we can now give that to them, and reap the increased production as our own reward.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our faithful researchers beg us to provide their facilities with clean air, water, and other things necessary for their research efforts. And we'll certainly give these things to them if it suits the Angelic Order's interests.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The private economy is a wicked thing, full of scams and treachery. But some followers are notoriously good at navigating this snake pit, notably the most devout. Boosting our economic buildings should please them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: AngelsExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: Composed of a wide variety of races, capable of surviving in a variety of environmental envelopes, gives the Angelic Order followers a unique ability to colonize worlds too difficult for single-species civilizations.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to many simultaneous advances in environmental and engineering research, aquatic worlds will no longer have reduced production, and can now be settled by the full spectrum of our followers species.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Frozen worlds will kill less of our followers now. Except when more potential energy is needed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Life on barren worlds is now far less tolerable for our followers, Followers on these planets are forbidden to be tapped for potential energy. This should help these planets further our cause.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on radioactive and toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our control over the texts that make up and interpret the faith, we can make our followers live on even the foulest and most toxic planetary environments. Enemies of the Angelic Order make ideal candidates.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Even mutants can believe in the faith, and they find more acceptance with the Angelic Order than they would elsewhere. But Mutants generally provide a particularly strong potential energy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: With our latest technology, we shall lose no more followers to hellacious toxic environments. More to feed our needs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A people made up of a number of different races is capable of making use of a far greater variety of biomes than a civilization with a less diverse make-up.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angelic Order insist that this technology must serve their purposes above all others.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the use of almost useless terrain.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: We now have the capability of fabricating land from almost nothing, allowing more to perform their tasks on formerly unusable terrain.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Environmental resequencing adds usable land to all planets in our power. This is a monumental technology, that shouldn't belong in the hands of a mortal. We are the immortal.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: This hyperdrive invention of the humans will dramatically speed up our efforts to convert the rest of the galaxy to the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can make better ships, faster, far-seeing, or longer lasting, we'll be able to spread the faith faster.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: These hyperdrives of the humans have a number of inefficiencies. Their misunderstanding will allow us the chance to spread the faith unto them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constuctor modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, our followers can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved life support recirculation systems will not only increase our ships' effective ranges, they'll make our crews more comfortable, and better able to remain on the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have found that by capturing ions during hyperdrive flight and adding them to the exhaust of our conventional engines we can travel faster. The Angelic Order insists we reward these researchers to promote increased efficiency.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A modification to the magnetic field capture device should lead to higher ion capture rates and higher speeds for our vessels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The field coils of our Ion Drives were over-specced, possibly to give a supplier tied to the Angelic Order a cushy deal. We've fixed that, which should lower our drive costs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our early hyperdrives were very heavy, made by an associate of the Angelic Order who was perhaps less than capable. It was tossed into a reactor core.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: "Stacked" hyperfields will magnify the acceleration effect they offer. These Warp fields will allow us to spread the faith to the distant corners of the galaxy much more rapidly.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ever pious researchers have found new ways to arrange the stacked hyperfields, leading to improved speed for all of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A critical part of our hyperfield generators was being manufactured by a supplier who was willing to lower his prices after converting to the Angelic Order.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A redesign of our hyperfield generators to accommodate the fact that we're now equipping them in parallel should lead to lower overall mass for these systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp uses cascading warp fields to allow out drives to compress already compressed space. The light that shines on our researchers' minds is sometimes a wondrous thing.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's not that we've gotten rid of all the waste in our hyperdrive construction, although we have gotten rid of most of it. It's just that all that waste that remains is going to the right parties.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angelic Order has found a supplier willing to deliver new, low-mass plasma conduits to us at the same cost as previous models. How fortunate we are that so many followers are willing to makes sacrifices of their own to help spread the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding drives will warp space around our ships as never before. The glory of the faith will arrive where we choose faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have found ways to generate hyperfields that can affect the speed of an entire fleet. The ships chosen to hold such technology will be enormously influential, and must be staffed by our most faithful crews.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Gravity Field manipulators will grant our vessels increased manoeuvrability and tactical options in those unfortunate situations when the faith is aggressively resisted by primitive minds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: A variant of the speed boosting technology can now be used to restrict the speed of any ships we so choose. The potential for criminal mischief with such a technology is high; The Angelic Order insist we keep it under close watch.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our speed boosting modules can now effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. This will allow us to equip our less faithful crews with less capable ships, without compromising fleet effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout the history of our various peoples, success has always hinged on knowing more than your adversary. Sensors and survey equipment will illuminate the galaxy to us, showing us the path forward.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have developed new algorithms for processing the information our sensors return, turning data from greater distances into usable intelligence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensors detect the perturbations emitted by hyperfields to detect ships moving faster than the speed of light. The equipment used to do this was initially quite costly, but our researchers have found ways to bring the prices down a little.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The more sensor equipment we can squeeze in our vessels the better, making this new lighter-weight sensor equipment our researchers have developed very valuable indeed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: The space folding perturbations emitted by ships travelling via hyperdrive are detectable at much greater distances than we'd previously thought. Our researchers have developed new sensors capable of using this new technique.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Additional shielding to isolate our sensors from the energy emitted by the ships carrying them seems to improve their ability.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have been using an aftermarket processing software which works the same as the one provided, but costs much less. We'll implement the change fleet wide, though probably won't investigate how an inefficient supplier won such a choice contract.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensor equipment comes from the manufacturer with much unneeded extra gear that our crews were stripping off. If we do that fleet wide, we should see lighter sensors for everyone.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the reality underneath this one. Devoid of sentient life, and thus normally beneath the interest of those who spread the faith, our researchers note that by accessing it, our sensors should be able to see further.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've rooted out a very clever scam in our network of sensor parts suppliers, an organization which had been over billing us for decades. Certain potential energy sources were tapped.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists are insisting we build their sensors with the suppliers of their choosing. Secular needs, such as the protection of the Angelic Order's interests, have long prevented this. But the potential weight savings may now be too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: In circumstances that require us to introduce the Path to an alien species via force, improved targeting and stealth systems will give our vessels the edge they need.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Our tactical sensor and jamming modules can now benefit an entire fleet of vessels. Cooperation will be necessary to maximize the effectiveness of this equipment, but that's an area the Angels have always excelled in.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors were the first beings created by the shattering of the great crystal. Much of what they know is lost to us, but by analysing their relics, we might peace together more of their history, shedding more light on the faith.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor technology seems to use a form of "dark energy" present both in the fragments of the long shattered crystal, as well as in all life. We still have much to learn to recreate this technology ourselves. But we must persist.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By selecting our most pious researchers to work on Precursor artifacts, we can ensure not only faster research, but that their secrets aren't leaked out to the heretics that lurk in the shadows of our culture.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we highlight the parallels newly discovered Precursor artifacts have with the faith, we can make the wisdom of our path more apparent to those in the galaxy who still refuse to see it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Carefully released details of new Precursor artifacts, details that support the elements of the Path related to industry and enterprise, should increase the economic boost these artifacts seem to cause in our people.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Precursor researchers require very specialized equipment to handle the dark energy flows these relics require. Dedicated facilities with this equipment should increase our ability to research these artifacts.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now trying to recreate some of the Precursor's technology, using the same dark energy that powered their own incredible devices. All Angels whose faith was wavering are finding it now. Even the heretics can see we're close to something big.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: We understand completely. The Precursors, their corrupted creator, their downfall. We know all. Furthermore, we now see a new path to Ascension, a new route that the Path may use to lead us to the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Life support is a complicated challenge for us, considering the many species which make up the Angels. But it's one we must tackle head on if we hope to introduce the Path to the unenlightened.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Blasphemers working in our shipyards have been sabotaging our life support systems, limiting our ship's ranges. We've fixed the damage, and will conduct a thorough inquisition to root out these villains.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A few days after we mentioned our problem with life support costs to one of our handlers in the Secret Order, our life support meal supplier voluntarily lowered their prices. Always nice when coincidences like that happen.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the mass of our air circulation and filtration systems should save weight our ships could use for other, more spiritual purposes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Support field systems use force fields to pipe nutrient-rich sludges to our crews. This will extend the range of our vessels and create a valuable sludge supply contract we can award to someone the Secret Order needs a favor from.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More refined force fields with user-customizable controls have cut down on the mess and waste of our support field systems. Our sludge supplier may have preferred the old, wasteful ways, but now our ships can now travel much further.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new force field supplier promises a cheaper brand of emitter will work in our life support systems, so long as we promise not to ask many questions about where they came from.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Less powerful force field emitters in our life support systems will save valuable weight. And our researchers note that we did not need that additional power, which was causing many of the messes in the first place.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Promethion technology improves the injection and recycling capabilities of our life support, generating small quantities of new food directly from waste. Our crews are resistant to the idea, but a simple change to the Path will make it their moral duty.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When appeals to their faith don't work, we can usually count on our suppliers cutting their prices after a few well timed visits from members of the Shadow Path. A shame for an arm or a leg to literally be at stake, but that's the way it has to be.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have devised a new type of Promethion field effecter which can be embedded directly in the nutrients, saving quite a bit of weight compared to their heavy, fixed counterparts.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Lossless systems are an uncomfortable concept, the profit potential of waste a place where the shadows of Angels culture have thrived. And yet we can't ignore the fact that long range ships will help spread the Way further than ever.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: New technology will make it possible to offload partial life support requirements to different vessels in a fleet, or even a nearby starbase. A superb way to extend the range of our fleets, and keep a measure of control over less faithful crews.

StringTable.Label: AngelsExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Promethion support technology can now be used by our fleet-support vessels. These vessels control the fate and welfare of an entire fleet, and must be staffed by our least corruptible crews.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: If we move ship construction to orbital environments we should be able to build larger hulls. But we should first ensure the Secret Order has a chance to get their people in place, to limit the chances of corruption developing in this new industry.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By putting only the most loyal people in charge of our ship construction academies, we can ensure the workers going into the field aren't corrupted. This should result in higher manufacturing, and far less blasphemy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By requiring fleet logistics officers to undertake extensive theological training we can ensure the workers that take those positions are influenced only by us. This should reduce corruption and thus increase our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Lazy or unmotivated ship builders can easily restrict the amount of usable space on a ship with their sloth. If we motivate them properly, we can ensure our ships have the most usable space possible.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Our blessed researchers have developed new techniques for orbital construction, which should lead to bigger vessels, better equipped to spread salvation.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new series of daily motivational sermons, focusing on the virtue of hard work, and the success our ships have spreading the Way, seems to have inspired our workers to build better, stronger ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: As orbital construction becomes more complicated, the opportunity for graft and bribery blooms. We must monitor our managers and planners carefully, casting them out as blasphemers at the first sign of corruption.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our loyal ship workers realized that hollow structural elements can contain various smaller ship systems, saving space for other equipment. Properly designed, these have no impact to a ship's durability. His brilliance will be well rewarded.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Larger hulls will allow us to spread our people, culture, and the Way faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It was a tremendous, almost miraculous insight to realize that molecular weaknesses in a hull could make it deformable in a controlled manner, increasing the resiliency of the entire hull. The researcher who came up with it is now a living legend.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We didn't dare trust our workers with heavy equipment when so many of them were potentially blasphemers. Now that the proper theological oversight is in place, this equipment should make construction faster and cheaper.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By rewarding workers who come up with space saving ideas with rewards, such as special dispensations from duties required by the Path, or even cash prizes, we've managed to improve the packing efficiency of all of our vessels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels vessels are now among the largest this galaxy has ever seen, rivaling even those of the Precursors. Few things will stop the primitive minds from learning the Way now.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've managed to root out the last bits of corruption in our construction sector, any small amounts of waste remaining being directed to places that suit the Secret Order's needs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels vessels are now as efficiently designed as possible, capable of any spiritual or secular mission we might throw at them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: The inner strength all Angels possess, thanks to their commitment to the Path, is now more than a metaphor. We can embed strengthening fields in the hulls of our vessels, making them as resilient as we are.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Metaphors continue to abound within our hulls. Our latest technology uses straightening fields to repair battle damage in our vessels, in the same way the Path can help restore our sense of purpose in the face of ignorance.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Nanobots are automations capable of repairing our ships and starbases, even during battle itself. The potential for criminal misuse of these is enormous, and they should only be deployed to our most loyal vessels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will expose selected Angels to excessive danger while protecting those who remain on our capital ships. So long as the pilots understand the risk, we shall allow this, while continuing to make all efforts to secure their future salvation.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: New, compact fighters, along with our growing cabal of pilots who don't mind cramped quarters, will allow us to begin deploying high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: The potential for corruption in our logistics department is incredible. If we are to have any hope of success, these must be the most pious Angels, subject to the highest scrutiny.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Relativistic travel creates a bookkeeping nightmare which mere faith does little to address. To counter this, we've developed a new system of record keeping, which should improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mines will always be a breeding ground for corruption; the Angels who choose to work there are almost always beyond salvation. Still, with the right management, we can contain the worst of the fraud and graft, indirectly increasing mining output.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are incredibly complicated operations, filled with people and groups that are all potential sources for inefficiency and corruption. Ensuring our shipyard managers are of the highest moral character should cut down on the waste somewhat.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Due to the many races which all achieved sentience on our home world, the Angels cooperate like few other civilizations. So long as corruption can remain in check, our fleet logistical operations will remain the envy of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: As our fleets grow, so does the challenge of supplying them. Although our starbases are staffed by faithful and honest Angels, segments of the supply chain remain quite corruptible. We must redouble our efforts to ensure out fleets stay supplied.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Logistics is now perhaps the most respected career path within our civilization, all of its priests renowned for their piousness and incorruptible character, only responding to our (and the Secret Order's) bidding.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved mining technology will ensure our mines produce more, even if so much of it is wasted by the wicked people who work there.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: After providing them the right training (and body armor) we've begun deploying loyal clerics to manage our mines, to both bring some measure of salvation to the scum that work there, and increase the output of goods which ultimately reach us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Replacing our miners with resource extraction probes not only cuts back on the opportunity for theft, it will allow us to extract minerals found in concentrations once thought too low to be worth our time.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturized resource extraction probes allows for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Even the rarest resources can feasibly be targeted for extraction now.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with closed minds. When our words fail us, we will have to introduce the Path to these heretics by force. Our own salvation depends on it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Researchers sworn to the Shadow Path have a certain knack for weapon design, and have developed basic weapons for our ships. A valuable group, although due to their flexible morals, they must be segregated from our regular research communities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There is something pure, even beautiful about beam weapons. Even an initiate on the Path can see the allegory in the manner they illuminate with such fury. And our new beam weapons shall be even more illuminating.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new type of focusing crystal will make the arguments put forward by our beam weapons a bit more penetrating.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Frustrated by the expense of beam weapon development, our weapons researchers contacted some peers in the Secret Order to help provide relief. Suddenly, many of our suppliers are offering discounts on beam weapon components.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The troubled minds of our weapons researchers have come up with a way to make our beam weapons more mass-efficient without losing any of their destructive ability.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: According to our weapons researchers, matter disruptors use a type of particle capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force. This meant little to us, but they promised it would make our vessels much more persuasive.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By using intelligent (but non-sentient) crystal growing processes, we can create focusing crystals capable of much higher energy throughputs, making all our beam weapons a bit stronger.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have been instructed to take some of the mysticism out of the manufacture of beam weapons. Shorter, less elaborate ritual blessings, and more automation should reduce the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the mass of our beam weapons' cooling equipment is a neat trick which our weapons researchers refuse to reveal how they accomplished. Some sort of industrial espionage seems likely, but we're not going to ask any questions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We've going to stop asking our weapons researchers how these weapons work. This latest one uses plasma, that much we were able to decipher. We are blessed that these maniacs are on our side.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our suppliers for plasma containment fields was not giving us the best possible price. Then after an unfortunate accident, he suddenly saw the error of his ways, lowering his prices and apologizing for his sins.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons are now as mass efficient as this reality will allow us. To get around these limits, we will have to ascend to a higher plane. But by that point, we'll no longer need weapons at all.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: Phaser particles are the most confusing thing our weapons researchers have invented yet. This feels dangerously close to blasphemy, twisting the physical world in this way. But the Way must be spread.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Doom Rays are a terrifying construct, more powerful than anything seen before. Even the Secret Order now worries about the sanity of our weapons researchers. Something will have to be done about them shortly.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Using a new ritual based on force fields, our weapons researchers have found a way to augment the beam output of an entire fleet. A blessed development, taking advantage of our people's natural affinity for cooperation.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers, the clever fiends, have developed a system that makes our beams more effective against shields. A similar system is capable of absorbing unbeliever beam attacks.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons can now cut entirely through shields. The unbelievers will have nowhere to cower now.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are these new missiles more destructive, their self-guiding capabilities neatly symbolize the guidance that the Path can provide even a simple mind.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have developed new launchers which can shoot more missiles. They insist, with wild, unfocused eyes, that such violence will help bring the Path to more minds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order has always thought highly of missiles due to their cost effectiveness, allowing more resources to remain unspent and within their control. And now our missiles are a little bit cheaper again.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple redesign of our ammunition storage racks has cut down on the mass of our missile launchers. A small step, but long journeys always begin as small steps.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Harpoon missiles will make a bigger explosion when they strike the hulls of unbelievers, lending more weight to our argument than mere words can.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Lightweight warheads which use the newest generation of explosives should improve the effective range of our missiles, allowing our vessels to deliver sermons from further away.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of ultra-stable explosive should be cheaper to manufacture, as it will require less safeguards to protect the simple, honest Angels who do the work.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With our new, lighter warheads, we can reduce the weight of each individual missile without compromising its ability to deliver potent arguments.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Photonic warheads use a shell of photons to pierce the shields and armor of their target, making them more effective. A suiting metaphor for a well worked argument that slips pasts an unbeliever's defenses, finally opening their eyes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile manufacturing has finally been brought entirely under the control of suppliers preferred by the Secret Order. We should see reduced costs for all of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our weapons researchers' had the insight to replace the ammunition storage racks with force-field based containment, which should reduce the mass of each system. Her brilliance has already been rewarded by her shadowy masters.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: Photon torpedoes improve upon the piercing technology of previous warheads using some form of science. The weapons researchers speak in a strange language, so we just have to have faith in them when they say these will be more effective.

StringTable.Label: AngelsNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo is proof that our weapons researchers have gone too far. Even the Secret Order blanches at their depravity. We shall still use their twisted invention, but solely as a last resort.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our blessed weapons researchers have devised a system which will allow a ship or starbase to improve the missile tracking ability of an entire fleet. Such cooperation features heavily in many elements of the Path.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile systems should now fare better when penetrating the point defenses of unbelievers. And our missile cooperation and coordination systems have been improved as well.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Semi intelligent warheads that cooperate can now neutralize point defense systems, leaving the unbelievers defenseless. And our missile cooperation systems have been blessed with even more power.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Projectile weapons are simple, and already have many established doctrines within the Path on their proper usage. These new versions are even more powerful, and should provide a convincing final argument to those who resist seeing the beauty of the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The cleverness of our weapons researchers has found that by switching to a slightly smaller projectile and installing coils which cycle up more rapidly, we can fire projectiles a bit faster, extending the effective range of each weapon.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our electromagnet suppliers have decided to provide their wares to us at cheaper prices. They state this is to help spread the Way more rapidly, although we don't doubt some secular pressure was placed on them as well.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some strange new winding of the electromagnetic coils results in lighter, more compact coils that are just as effective as before. Similar to the way the Shadow Path takes its own strange and winding path to achieve the same ends as us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Particles can be more effective than projectiles if we fire many of them at the same time. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as other kinetic weapons, so we won't have to update the components of the Path relevant to ship command.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These new superconductors will let us deliver energy upon our weapons more rapidly, resulting in higher speeds and a much longer effective range.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These new superconductors mean our electromagnetic coils will require less cooling, reducing the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers seem confident we can use these new superconductors to build smaller, more compact acceleration coils, resulting in more persuasive ability per unit of mass.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons researchers won't reveal to us what a graviton is, claiming the Path that we're on won't permit understanding of it. A troubling claim, but we can't deny the effectiveness of the weapons that make use of these new particles.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Huge portions of our superconductor industry are now infiltrated by Angels who follow the Path of Shadows. The Secret Order now ensures that we will get the best possible price on all future kinetic weapon components.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Even our smallest vessels can now argue persuasively thanks to our weapons researchers' efforts to reduce the weight of our kinetic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers strike unbelievers with mass that doesn't exist in this reality. Every plane of existence now supports our war to spread the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers attack unbelievers with tiny black holes, destroying the souls trapped within. This is horrifying. We shall use these only as a last resort, and take immediate steps to restrain these weapons researchers and their twisted minds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening systems will allow Angels ships equipped with the right modules to cooperate, boosting the range of their kinetic weapons. Our arguments shall become stronger together.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our kinetic weapons can now generate ultra-dense outer surfaces to make them more effective at countering unbeliever armor systems. And our fleet kinetic cooperation systems have been improved again.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now crack the armor of the unbelievers entirely, leaving them defenseless against our reasoning. And our natural affinity for cooperation has found ways to improve upon our fleet kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: When our words fail us, we must turn to other means. The Way must be spread if we are to find salvation, and if that means force, we must face that challenge head on, and militarize our infrastructure at once.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A specialized branch of the Path, designed just for soldiers, will give them more time to train without compromising their spiritual obligations.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By making the requirement for civic duty and defense an integral part of the Path, our colonists will be able to turn into more effective militias if the unthinkable happens and the unbelievers arrive at our door.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: When unbelievers cower on their planets, spouting their blasphemies, we shall have to get up close to show them the error of their ways. Tactics and equipment to land on a world and take it by force will be necessary.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows planetary bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Dropping something very heavy and very fast on someone is not a great way to persuade them of your righteousness. But it is a good way to convince any survivors who witnessed it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows informational warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare saps the ability of unbelievers to coordinate their ground defenses. If they refuse to see the truth of the Way after that, then they deserve what happens to them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows biological warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: There can be no equivocation: we must convert all life to the Way. If a being refuses to do so, they have no place in the galaxy, and even tactics like biological warfare become permitted by the Path. Their death will lead to our salvation.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can identify and select our most pious soldiers, then give them extra training and spiritual guidance, they'll become far more effective when fulfilling their sacred duties spreading the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: If we induce flooding we can drown unbelievers and crush their defenses before having to risk any of our own souls. The weakened fools will prove far less resistant to conversion then.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing volcanic and tectonic activity sends a clear sign to unbelievers: even the forces of nature bow before the glory of the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: Smart (but non-sentient) drone soldiers provide more persuasive ability than conventional troops, without needing to risk Angels souls to deliver it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: High density troop transports will allow us to deliver more persuasive ability to the homes of unbelievers faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't assume the unbelievers will accept the truth without struggle. We must ensure our own colonies are capable of defending against the blind thrashings of these closed minds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: If we bury infrastructure and our most vital spiritual structures, we can provide our civilians and soldiers sanctuary from orbital bombardment, limiting its effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to information warfare.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The devout Angels blessed with minds capable of manipulating computers have found a number of ways to harden them against unbeliever attacks.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to biological warfare.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Biological attacks are horrific and we our fortunate our blessed researchers have devised a form of adaptive vaccine which should protect against the worst the unbelievers can throw against us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital defense platforms shall halt the unbelievers in space, long before they can menace the sanctity of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to shields, strengthening fields, and sacred hardening rituals, we're now capable of developing domes which will protect against almost all forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with close-minded individuals who resist being shown the Path, or even struggle against it. They must be dealt with harshly. Our own salvation rests on their conversion.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow The Path of Shadows understand that when Force is called for, it must be total, overwhelming, and unstoppable. When the unbelievers meet our Shadow Warriors they shall see the truth of the Path firsthand.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that when our lives and salvation are under threat, everyone that walks the Path, regardless of caste or clan, must defend the Way to their dying breath.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Planets resist culture flipping much longer.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that it is the only acceptable means of finding salvation, and that the customs of unbelievers should be shunned, as they are anathema to the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDevineFleets_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Divine Temple Support Module.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDevineFleets_Dec
StringTable.String: Divine Temples can be installed on appropriately anointed vessels, providing all ships in a fleet a certainty of purpose that they are fighting a righteous cause.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUndauntedCrews_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit points of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUndauntedCrews_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who truly walk the Path do not feel the pains inflicted by the world, and will not panic when a ship is crumbling around them, standing and fighting until their last breath.

StringTable.Label: AngelsRighteousStrength_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the defenses of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: AngelsRighteousStrength_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's due to the ingenuity of our crews, or the intervention of a higher power, our dedication to the Path gives our ship's defenses a righteous strength that helps protect against even the most devastating attacks.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We must protect the lives of the Angels who crew our vessels. Theirs is the hardest, most critical task in our mission to spread the Way, and they deserve nothing less.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
