StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have found a more efficient arrangement of shield generators which should reduce the costs of assembling our shields.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Increasing the firing rate of our point defense systems is a simple but effective means of increasing their effectiveness. The Path states that simple solutions are often the best ones.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have modified the way our armor panels are made, which should make them easier to fit to our ships, reducing overall armor weight.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Shields are a vast improvement over earlier deflector fields, and will provide our crews sanctuary against even the most violent attacks.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Larger, more robust field emitters, ritually blessed upon installation, should improve the strength of our shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shield systems are made by a variety of suppliers, not all of whom are as devoted to spreading the Way as they should be. We've asked our contacts in the Secret Order to convince them to lower their prices using more secular means.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have found a way to slim down the field emitters used by our shield systems, resulting in lower mass shields. Now our ships can carry additional shields, or, if necessary, more persuasive equipment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Barrier Fields improve earlier shields by absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes them. The parallel with our ability to absorb new species into our civilization is delightful, a sure a sign as we need that our Way is the one true Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest Barrier Fields used an improperly specified form of capacitor in the energy absorption system. Replacing these with the proper model should result in significantly more resilient shields.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers report that our shield generators can be made for far cheaper than they already are. The Secret Order promises to contact the vendors and investigate the source of this discrepancy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: New forms of superconductor recently acquired by our weapons researchers can also be used to make our shields much less bulky, thanks to their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest shields use a scientific ritual to direct energy to the portion of the shields which requires it the most. An excellent metaphor for the way the Path teaches us to spread the Way in the direction of those that need it the most.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have only a limited amount of resources, and many needs that require them. As vital as our shields are, if they can cost less, that would be something to be thankful of.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Denser, more compact shields mean we can install more of them on the vessels that need them most, the ones spreading the Way to the most closed minds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels vessels are now all but invincible. Our faithful crews never knew fear before, and with these new shields, they'll never have to.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: New technology which allows us to augment shields at a distance will allow Angels vessels to cooperate in combat situations in the same manner with which Angels cooperate in their daily lives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shield cooperation systems have been improved yet again, incorporating the absorption properties of our Barrier Field systems. Few unbelievers will dare menace a Angels fleet now.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Shields will provide no sanctuary for the unbelievers now, thanks to our new systems capable of interfering with their shield systems. Additionally, our own shield support systems have been blessed with more power.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Point defenses use tiny railguns to protect against the missiles fired by unbelievers. We should not place all of our faith in them however, as they are of limited use against other forms of weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new type of firing pattern will make our point defenses more accurate and capable of defending the lives of our brave crews.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no excuse for suppliers to overcharge us on defensive equipment. It is a moral obligation of every Angels to protect their brothers. We will ask the Secret Order to vigorously remind our vendors of their civic and moral duties.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of point defense, using smaller slugs and railguns will prove just as effective against unbeliever missile attacks, while saving weight for our vessels to carry other equipment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: Electronic counter measures provide an unseen form of sanctuary against missiles, confusing and distracting them from their sinister purposes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The researchers who work on ECM suites hare developed new computing rituals which should improve the performance of those systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have discovered which of our ECM rituals were most effective. By stripping the ineffective modules from these suites, we can reduce the costs of these units.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were assembled very inefficiently. Some sermons on the virtue of effort and competent work should help convince those workers to mend their ways, reducing the mass of those vital pieces of equipment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Drones that have been provided with specially anointed point defense equipment will be able to intercept unbeliever missiles long before they threaten our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of aiming ritual implemented by our drones should reduce the total amount of computing power they require without affecting their accuracy. The cost savings could be significant.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: New lightweight composites and force field based containment will make our drone systems lighter, and easier to install in even our smallest vessels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Aereon drones use our most advanced railguns, ECM, and chafe to defend our vessels. Even the most aggressive of the close minded species will have trouble getting past these.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The tracking systems used by point defenses can be supplemented by a module carried by another Angels vessel. As always, the Angels shall be stronger together than apart.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cooperative point defense modules can now use a form of wide-area counter measure to confuse unbeliever missiles. If only the unbelievers could be so easily led astray themselves.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems add point defenses to ships that would normally be left vulnerable. And our new counter-counter measures will more easily penetrate the flimsy counter arguments offered by unbeliever point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is a simple solution to a complicated problem, much in the same way that an individual who starts along the Path finds that all of life's complications seem far more manageable.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A miraculous insight has allowed one of our defensive researchers to devise a form of armor panel denser than previous versions. All of our vessels will now be a little safer.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angels who manufacture armor are common folk, barely capable of keeping on the Path. We shall have to manage them closely to ensure their time isn't wasted, and our armor is made as cheaply as possible.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: No amount of faith can make armor anything but what it is: heavy. But if we improve the mounting, fit and placement of our armor panels, our defensive researchers believe we should be able to minimize the weight somewhat.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Durantium composites are the latest invention our blessed defensive researchers have delivered unto us. Our ships and crews will now be far more resilient when presenting our beliefs to the unbelievers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of lamination has been found to make our armor far more resilient. It is much like the way that brief but regular study of the Path can gird an individual for the challenges of life.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no room for profit in the production of armor, not when Angels lives are at stake. We've asked our contacts in the Secret Order to ensure that no armor is lost to graft or other form of blasphemy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A brilliant young researcher has found a new arrangement of Durantium which is lighter than previous versions but just as resilient. His brilliance has saved Angels lives and brought salvation just a bit closer.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium lamination allows our armor to turn into a fluid when confronted by unbeliever energy. The way it absorbs abuse then recovers its shape calls to mind the way the Path allows Angels to adapt to the various trials of life.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: By cooperating more fully with our ship designers - a simple task for our kind - we can ensure our ship designs allow for easy installation of armor, reducing the cost by some margin.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is only so much mass you can remove from armor before it's not armor any more. We've taken all we can. The Path never stops, but in this field at least, it will now slow to a crawl.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero point armor uses energy from the quantum vacuum itself to repulse unbeliever attacks. There is strange science at work here, and if it were anyone other than our devout defensive researchers offering it, we'd mistrust it deeply.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Force fields that induce hardening effects can allow a Angels vessel to strengthen all of its peers. Which seems a very Angels thing for one of our vessels to do.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have discovered a new strengthening ritual that our armor support systems can use to increase their hardening effects.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor strengthening fields can now do the exact opposite to the unbelievers, weakening their armor, making them more open to persuasion. And the same brilliance has made our own ships stronger again.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConversionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path for the entire Angels civilization begins here. If we hope to introduce the Way to all sentient life, we'll need some means of communicating it to them. Here, our journey begins.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We will not experience salvation until all sentient life has been shown the Way. Universal Translators are the first and most crucial step on this Path, allowing us to set our neighbors down their own Path to enlightenment.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Peaceful relations are ideal for spreading the Way. We should do all we can to establish healthy relationships with our neighbors before they can close their minds to us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The unbelievers will respect us more if they see how committed we are to our Path. By establishing our passion right from the beginning of our relationship, we can benefit more strongly from our chosen ideological approach.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization whose distant outposts are many weeks of travel away is a challenge we must tackle head on. If we expect to win the entire galaxy, we can't lose hold of our own people.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist governments share much of the power with local governments. This encourages economic development, and thanks to the influence of our peers in the Secret Order, results in little loss of practical control for us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist governments make the people happy above all other activities. A noble intent, although we do have loftier goals than ensuring happiness in this realm. On the plus side, representatives from these governments make very convincing diplomats.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments strike a balanced approach to governance, with no notable strengths or weak spots. A natural form for the Angels, considering our history is filled with examples of cooperation between the disparate species of our own world.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: A Galactic Republic will improve efficiency and contentment, and provide an ideal platform from which we can spread the Way further.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An Industrialist government will lead our people on a Path committed to hard work and quality, improving the production potential of our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A Mercantilist approach to governance will boost our coffers through trade, both the fair and unfair kind. The Secret Order salivate at the increased opportunity for espionage all this trading will permit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angels are not naturally inclined to studies of the physical world, but we cannot assume the unbelievers of this galaxy will be the same way. A Technologist Party will ensure we don't fall too far behind.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An Interstellar Democracy will allow our people to pick, after a fashion, their own leaders. That their leaders will be pre-selected by the Secret Order is a small matter, which won't hurt the benefits we expect this form of government to provide.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When the unbelievers of the galaxy close their minds to us, we will be presented with no choice but to convert them to the Path forcefully. When it comes to this, we must be sure every single Angels stands behind us.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our words travel farther when people like us, and a commitment to peaceful relations and social welfare does just that. The Pacifist party can win minds like few others.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A Star Federation is perfect, using every organizational strategy our people have discovered to govern a galactic civilization with the bare minimum of waste. As close to perfection as mortals in this realm can achieve, anyways.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The closer our relations with our neighbors, the easier it will be to lead them on the Path. Embassies and treaties are the first step of many to come.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will encourage increased economic activity between us and our neighbors, activity which our peers in the Secret Order can take advantage of.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A cultural treaty is ideal for our purposes, easing the flow of scripture and ideas between us and our neighbors, making them more open to accepting the Path into their lives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Formal research treaties will increase our own research potential, allowing our neighbors to enrich us with knowledge of the physical world in the same way we shall enrich them spiritually.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Formal alliances will tie us closer to our neighbors, increasing the opportunity we'll have to show them our ways and lead them on to the Path.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Military alliances will give our forces a much needed edge when bringing light to the unbelievers. Manipulating an ally into doing the hard work is a time-honored tradition in Angels history.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will allow us to make full use of a neighbor's scientific expertise, providing us rapid access to the tools we need to spread the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: An ally with the wisdom to form a cultural alliance with us will soon find the inner peace that comes to all who set down the Path.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our reputation for wisdom has spread throughout the galaxy. Any bargaining table we find ourselves at soon begins slanting in our direction.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way now sells itself, and so perfect a spiritual life do our people live that people throughout the galaxy clamor to join the Path themselves.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets is filled with unbelievers. But our wisdom has slowly begun to open their minds, and so respected are we that now our votes go a bit further than before.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: So convinced of our wisdom and sincerity are our allies, that they will now vote with us on all United Planets measures. This surrender of authority is but a first step; the Path beckons them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Angels Consulate and Ministry.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the primary doctrine of the ancient Angelsiac religion. It is the set of core teachings, ideals, and laws that the Angels must live by to bring them closer to learning the true Way of the universe.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The way one walks down the Path can attract and influence others to begin their own journey. By encouraging Angels with exposure to outside parties to better represent ourselves and our ways, we can more easily convince others to join the Path.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who commit fully to the Path enter a state of inner serenity, and find that the concerns of the secular world seem less important to their eyes. Encouraging this commitment amongst our people will lead to higher approval across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Angelsiac Temples.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Once a Angels has commenced along the Path, the next step is for them to find his or her Calling. It is though service to their Calling that the Angels contribute to the overarching goal of our people, spreading the Angelsiac Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call of Order have a special urge to travel the distant stars, showing others the Path, and convincing them to leave their close-minded ways behind and join the Angels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call of Peace are filled with an overflowing joy, and work tirelessly to share it with all of their fellow Angels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance and manufacturing cost of Angelsiac Improvements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call to Action take great pride in the work of their devout brethren, and donate assets and labor to support their work and help spread the Way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Angelsiac Order and Sanctuary.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Angelsiac Orders were founded to help Angels take the last step on the Path, and find the Way. These Orders are the glue which hold the Angels together, ensuring the Angelsiac Way will eventually be found by all.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of The Order of Influence travel beyond our borders as missionaries, advocates, and advisors, using their specialized training to teach unenlightened minds the advantages that following the Path might offer.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of The Order of Hope understand that enlightenment begins from within, and dedicate their efforts to serving the needs of their home worlds, making sure that no one that walks the Path suffers unnecessarily.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance and manufacturing cost of Angelsiac Improvements.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of the Order of Service commit themselves to the construction and maintenance of the Angelsiac infrastructure, dedicating their lives to the facilities that ensure the Path can be found by all.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheWayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Angelsiac Oracle.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheWayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At the end of the Path one finds the Way. The Way reveals the truth of our universe to those who behold it, and teaches those so enlightened that they must forever help others walk the Path, until all beings in the universe live as one.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheWayPerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow the Way must be able to educate and influence the lost. A select few choose to walk the Way of Leadership, to better equip them for securing the future of the Angels, and all sentient life.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheWayPerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss teaches that for the Angels to bring all sentient life to the Path we must achieve perfect harmony within our own civilization first.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathofShadows_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathofShadows_Dec
StringTable.String: There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Angelsiac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Angels in their own way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: All Angels, regardless of training, understand the importance of teaching others how to walk the Path. We should do everything in our power to enable our people to travel the galaxy spreading the truth.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: New arrivals to our colonies, even those just passing through, must be introduced to the Path as quickly as possible, in the manner they're most receptive to. Assimilation centers will train the Angels who do this vital work.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the only means of achieving salvation, and all who claim otherwise are heretics. With these latest cultural buildings, the light of the Path shall shine brightly on all of civilized space.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way beckons us closer, as civilized minds throughout the galaxy begin their journey down the Path. On the horizon, the light of salvation rises.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Our economy is too secular for most Angels, and long been beneath the interests of all but the Secret Order. Nevertheless, we won't be able to spread the Way with faith alone. Improved economic structures will help fill our treasury.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order would like us to adjust the regulations affecting some very specific businesses which they presumably have an interest in. They promise this will lead to more funds for the treasury though, so a fair trade it would seem.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Additional trade routes will allow our treasury to grow faster, and give the Secret Order an additional avenue for pursuing their own type of profit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: New economic buildings will provide the marketplaces our private sector require to make their transactions, and, indirectly, provide our masters in the Secret Order more transactions to skim.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShadowEnforcers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShadowEnforcers_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path dose not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: The limited speed of communication across our vast civilization has opened the door to new types of fraud. New economic structures will help eliminate or at least bring this fraud under our control, boosting our economic income.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order recommends we increase trading activity, which will increase our treasury at the same time it provides cover for their own "trading" activities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we give the say-so, the Secret Order can deploy its members to the worlds of our neighbors, gathering information that we can use to our advantage during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Visitors to our worlds should be coming for spiritual enlightenment, not amusements. But when the close-minded refuse to see the Path in front of them, we might as well profit as much as we can from their visit.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The complexity of our secular financial sector is baffling to us. But the Secret Order assure us it will lead us to the Way, and that new financial structures will arrive us there sooner.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Letting businesses from across the galaxy trade portions of themselves in our stock markets is a confusing idea. The profits that flow our way are substantial, but is this really leading us towards salvation?

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Trade provides an opportunity to enrich ourselves from the appetites our neighbors have for our goods. The Secret Order thrive on trading like this, and encourage us to actively pursue it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Fixed trading hubs will not only increase our ability to trade, they'll ensure that more goods pass within sight of the Secret Order and their sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: As our trading ports grow ever larger, we see now the wisdom of such trade. These funds, which would have gone to waste in the hands of the unbelievers, can be used to bring the Path right back to their doorstep.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our trade empire is almost complete, every corner of the galaxy now tapped by members of the Shadow Path for potential profits. Our latest trading facilities will only extend our fingers further.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShadowTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShadowTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAngelsTourismTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Word of the Angelsiac faith and the salvation it represents has spread throughout the galaxy. Many new races are coming to our worlds to take their first hesitant steps along the Path. We should do everything we can to prepare for them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: Sadly, many of the visitors to our planets are not setting down the Path as quickly as we'd hoped. They spend money here, which is fine. But we need more. Perhaps some new facilities can convince them to stay longer.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The crowds are growing, and word of the natural beauty of Angels worlds is spreading. We're beginning to see changes in their attitude as well and foresee that the Path will soon have many new travelers on it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Every sentient mind in this galaxy understands the importance of the Angelsiac faith, and even if they have yet to set down the Path themselves, will make a point of visiting here at least once in their lives.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAngelsConversionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase tourism income and influence on all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAngelsConversionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of tourism is finally paying dividends. All who visit our worlds find themselves filled with the urge to return home and extol the virtues of the Path to their own kind.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With experience, and suffused with the wisdom the Path offers them, our colonists have found a number of ways to improve our basic colonial structures.

StringTable.Label: AngelsConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels who follow the Shadow Path have long struggled with blasphemers in our manufacturing sector who siphon funds off for their own sinister needs. We must do everything we can to stop them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The more orderly a Angels's internal mind, the more orderly they make the world around them. By preferentially promoting our most enlightened manufacturing workers, we might hope to improve our manufacturing sector.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people have mastered manufacturing in much the same way we have mastered the Path that leads to the Way. But we are mortals, far from perfection. More improvements remain to be found.

StringTable.Label: AngelsResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are more committed to the Path than almost all other Angels, but remain naive about the ways of the world. With the right oversight, we can ensure their work spreads the Path in the manner best suiting our needs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers assure us that if we begin specializing our research efforts, this will lead to tools that can help spread the Path faster.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farmers are simple folk, with but a rudimentary understanding of the Path. All they care for is dirt, and the tools to work with it. So we shall give them better tools.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Even something as simple as our farms cannot remain free from waste. The Secret Order is asking, no, demanding, that we do something about it.

StringTable.Label: AngelsFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farmers are simple folk, following a simplifed version of the Path, and sometimes resent the attention we pay to them. But the importance of food production to our society is to much to leave it entirely in their hands. Our farms must get better.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels's farms are among the best in the galaxy, the skill, faith, and industry of our farmers an example to us all. But a few improvements remain to be made to their practices.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right environmental tweeks, we can improve the efficiency of our colonies and make them more usable by the elements of our society we want to reward.

StringTable.Label: AngelsColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can improve the conditions for the poor fools living on extreme worlds, they'll surely be grateful to us. The Secret Order loves it when favors are owed to them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Using forced colonization of the most extreme worlds as punishment was an ideal stick to wield during inquisitions. But the galaxy is too crowded to let these worlds remain unproductive.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our faithful researchers have come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: AngelsIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Apparently our new Ion Drive systems had a number of inefficiencies in their design which need to be corrected. We pray this was an honest mistake, and not a sign of our researchers being corrupted by heretical thoughts.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems that new hyperdrive technologies always have room for improvement, and that this doesn't imply corruption on the part of our researchers at all. We had prayed this was the case.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels drives are among the most powerful in the galaxy, the brilliance of our researchers as sure a sign of the righteousness of the Way as anything else we can offer. And still those blessed minds insist they can do better.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are constantly hard at work on our sensor systems, looking for minor improvements while still pursuing the next breakthrough.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of our ships' crews regularly blaspheme against the Path and tinker with the equipment sent for them to do their work. We typically look the other way, but when their adjustments lead to improvements, we'd be fools not to capitalize on them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It is of no surprise that the Angels would master sensor technology so easily. Knowledge is the cornerstone of everything we are. Our wisest and most pious scientists are now putting the finishing touches on their masterpieces.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursor relics we find have strange effects on the Angels, evoking a sense of wonder, excitement, and even greed. With our skills at manipulating sentiment, we should be able to capitalize on specific benefits if we choose.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although we aim to bring salvation, even to the deceased, we cannot allow Angels to perish without cause. Our life support systems must get better.

StringTable.Label: AngelsSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Field-based life support systems are a little messy. We'll need to do something about this, lest our crews lose faith in our stewardship.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels crews are now as well fed and cared for as those in our colonies. Even better perhaps, for some of our less favored colonists at least. But a few more improvements remain to be made in these systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital construction is hard to maintain control of, with too many moving parts to buy off, and the workers too wealthy to be deterred by their religious obligations. We may require more severe management techniques.

StringTable.Label: AngelsZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital construction remains a dangerous occupation, with many unexplain accidents sapping productivity. We must do what we can to limit the influence of unfriendly factions in this sector, if only for the sake of our faithful workers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: With the worst corrupting influences removed from our shipyards, we can safely allow our innocent researchers on site to allow them to work their wonderous magic, improving our construction.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: As good as they already are, with the right motivation, our workers and designers should be able to make better ships. And between faith and money, we've got the best motivational tools known to sentient life on hand.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Fighter pilots are extremely pious, dedicated to the Path like few others. This makes them not only incorruptible, but reliable sources of wisdom. We should listen to their ideas for improving our carriers.

StringTable.Label: AngelsLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newly established logistical seminaries are not only training a new generation of logistical workers, they're also coming up with surprising improvements we can implement to our existing operations.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers recommend we dedicate our efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, which will make it easier to develop more destructive weapons. These followers of the Shadow Path are a bloodthirsty lot.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers regularly push past boundaries more peaceful minds would stop at, their lust for destructive potential pushing the limits of our understanding of materials science. The results are hard to argue with though.

StringTable.Label: AngelsHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have found several mistakes in their work on our beam systems. Their self-flagellation is not part of any Path we sanctify, but if it leads to improvements, we're willing to look the other way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers warn that our weapons are nearing perfect efficiency. But the Path, even the Shadow Path, does not permit rest. They must always look to do better.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have been busy demolishing asteroids with their new toys. A strange bunch, but it's not our place to question them, and the Secret Order seem pleased with the improvements they're finding for our missile systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have cloistered themselves in an explosives testing facility. There is a lot more laughter eminating than is befitting such a pious group, but they will ultimately be judged by their results.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers' brilliance is a troubling thing, constrained only by the limits set forth by the mysterious Path of Shadows. But the results cannot be argued with; Angels warheads are now feared throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers are conducting strange, scientific rituals on the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons. They promise this could lead to a number of improvements in these systems.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A private company has developed a new form of superconductor. Elements of the Shadow Path have already "acquired" this technology, and provided it to our weapons researchers to help improve our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: AngelsKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels vessels are now renowned throughout the galaxy for the speed and force with which we can deliver enlightenment upon unbelievers. But our weapons researchers aren't done yet, and claim further improvements are still to come.

StringTable.Label: AngelsMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The portions of the Path which governs the Angels in charge of our military can be adjusted in small ways to direct their efforts toward areas that require special attention.

StringTable.Label: AngelsInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way must be accepted by all sentient beings for us to achieve salvation. That can be accomplished by persuasion and argument. Or it can be accomplished by making less sentient beings.

StringTable.Label: AngelsGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have developed tools which allow us to manipulate gravitational fields. These horrible weapons should only be used when all other forms of persuasion have failed.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: When the unbelievers come to our homes, we can't pretend that they will fight honorably. We must develop defenses to counter their sinister devices.

StringTable.Label: AngelsJihadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that fallow the Path have no fear, their faith filling them with confidence and a strength that can be used against the unbelievers in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDevineMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship based Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDevineMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Crews and officers that fully master the Path and comprehend the Way in all its beauty will find that the weapons of the unbelievers hold less menace for them.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've set up a separate team of devoted researchers to devise ways to protect against the weapons our devious weapons researchers are coming up with. Already these blessed minds are finding ways to improve upon their work.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the diligent work of our defensive researchers, our shields continually get better. Their work is a shining example of what minds that follow the Path are capable of.

StringTable.Label: AngelsBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers are ashamed of themselves due to several oversights in the implementation of our Barrier Fields. After their self-cleansing ritual concludes, they promise to upgrade these systems immediately.

StringTable.Label: AngelsShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The shields of Angels vessels are famed throughout the galaxy, even the unbelievers unable to deny their effectiveness. But there is no end to the Path, and our defensive researchers continue to look for ways to improve upon their excellence.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our point defense systems are still primitive, with much room for improvement. As our defensive researchers become more enlightened about their capabilities, we should see some positive changes.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have been working tirelessly on our counter measure systems, a labor made easier by the knowledge that their efforts will save the lives of other Angels.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drones, despite lacking sentience, are our most faithful warriors, tirelessly working to protect the lives of Angels crews. Our defensive researchers adore them, and work almost as energetically to make them more capable.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor will never be good enough, not as long as there are still hostile unbelievers in this galaxy. Our defensive researchers must do everything in their power to improve upon their work.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As our armor systems become more complicated, only our most enlightened, most pious researchers can keep up with the science involved. But this winnowing process makes it easier for good ideas to rise to the top.

StringTable.Label: AngelsArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Angels vessels are as sturdy and reliable as any in the galaxy, protected by armor imbued with the faith of an entire people. And still our diligent defensive researchers work to make it better.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the history and culture of the unbelievers who surround us, we might better understand them, and more ably convince them to join the Path.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout our history, the Angels have experienced a wide variety of governments. All have been acceptable, so long as the goal that they aim for remained the same.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Installing a new political theory in our people is a trivial thing, requiring only new instructions be delivered to our clergy on how best to guide their flocks on the new branch of the Path we're setting down.

StringTable.Label: AngelsPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: So great are our powers of persuasion that we can now steer the minds of our people to either extreme of morality with incredible ease.

StringTable.Label: AngelsDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: All treaties encourage peaceful relations, making them ideal for influencing our neighbors spiritual lives. But some treaties have other, more secular effects, which we'd do well to consider.

StringTable.Label: AngelsAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We should consider what our neighbors can offer us when forming alliances with them. Although bringing them on to the Path is the long term goal, we will have many intermediate goals along the way.

StringTable.Label: AngelsThePathSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all Angels must follow the Path, there is some room for individualization and expression. Depending on how we move along the Path, the influence and internal approval of our entire civilization might be affected.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheCallingOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Not all Callings are created equally, and depending on the challenges that confront our civilization, we may wish to support those who have chosen a specific Calling.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheOrderFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: All of the Angelsiac Orders are critical to the functioning of our civilization, though in some situations it may behoove us to strengthen one Order above the others.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTheWayPerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have found the Way understand the importance of convincing the entire galaxy to walk the Path along with us. We must do anything we can do to support their work.

StringTable.Label: AngelsCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: A representative from the Secret Order has approached us with some "suggestions" about how to improve our handling of the economy. Suggestions from this channel are often not suggestions at all.

StringTable.Label: AngelsEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order has provided us with a list of economic initatives they'd like us to persue. We don't have to do everything on this list, but they promise that whatever we do will be worth our while.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading is a secular activity, one enlightened Angels have little to do with. But the Secret Order have many ideas how we could adjust our trading activites to our benefit. And, no doubt, to theirs.

StringTable.Label: AngelsTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer satisfied by their regular profiteering, the Secret Order is now encouraging us to restructure our trading activities to target specific economic sectors.

StringTable.Label: AngelsApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
